text: John Douglas Watsford (27 February 1876 – 4 December 1915) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Doug Watsford's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1876 births Category:1915 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Dandenong Football Club players
title: Doug Watsford
